meta.name: requests
meta.narrative: requests is the most popular Python HTTP library ('HTTP for Humans'). Originally created by Kenneth Reitz, it is now maintained by the Python Software Foundation under the psf/requests organization. Despite past governance concerns, it remains actively maintained with regular security patches and releases.

expected.notes: Mature, PSF-maintained package with solid adoption and moderate activity. Should score well despite lower commit velocity than projects like React.
